verses.verse: <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
These were the <S%H8269>princes<s%> whom he <S%H5838>had:<s%> Azariah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

<S%H456>Elihoreph<s%> and <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7894>Shisha,<s%> <S%H5608>scribes;<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud,<s%> the <S%H2142>recorder;<s%>
and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army;<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> were <S%H3548>priests;<s%>

and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> was over the <S%H5324>officers;<s%> and <S%H2071>Zabud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> was chief <S%H3548>minister,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7463>friend;<s%>
and <S%H301>Ahishar<s%> was over the <S%H1004>household;<s%> and <S%H141>Adoniram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5653>Abda<s%> was over the men subject to forced <S%H4522>labor.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who provided <S%H3557>food<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H1004>household:<s%> each <S%H259>man<s%> had to make <S%H3557>provision<s%> for a <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8141>year.<s%>
These are their <S%H8034>names:<s%> Ben <S%H1133>Hur,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%>
Ben <S%H1128>Deker,<s%> in <S%H4739>Makaz,<s%> and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim,<s%> and Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> and Elon Beth <S%H358>Hanan;<s%>
Ben <S%H1136>Hesed,<s%> in <S%H700>Arubboth<s%> (to him belonged <S%H7755>Socoh,<s%> and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>);
Ben <S%H1125>Abinadab,<s%> in all the <S%H5299>height<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> (he had <S%H2955>Taphath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> as <S%H802>wife<s%>);

<S%H1195>Baana<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud,<s%> in <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and all Beth <S%H1052>Shean<s%> which is <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H6891>Zarethan,<s%> beneath <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> from Beth <S%H1052>Shean<s%> to Abel <S%H65>Meholah,<s%> as far as <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3361>Jokmeam;<s%>

Ben <S%H1127>Geber,<s%> in Ramoth <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> (to him belonged the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> which are in <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%> to him belonged the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob,<s%> which is in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%>);
<S%H292>Ahinadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> in <S%H4266>Mahanaim;<s%>
<S%H290>Ahimaaz,<s%> in <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> (he also <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> as <S%H802>wife<s%>);
<S%H1195>Baana<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2365>Hushai,<s%> in <S%H836>Asher<s%> and <S%H1175>Bealoth;<s%>
<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6515>Paruah,<s%> in <S%H3485>Issachar;<s%>
<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H414>Ela,<s%> in <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%>

<S%H1398>Geber<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> and of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> and he was the <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H5333>officer<s%> who was in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7227>many<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> and making <S%H8056>merry.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> from the <S%H5104>River<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> they <S%H5066>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H3899>provision<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H7058>meal,<s%>

<S%H6235>ten<s%> head of <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle<s%> out of the <S%H7471>pastures,<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> besides <S%H354>harts,<s%> and <S%H3180>gazelles,<s%> and <S%H6643>roebucks,<s%> and <S%H75>fattened<s%> <S%H1257>fowl.<s%>

For he had <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over all on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> from <S%H8607>Tiphsah<s%> even to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> over all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>River:<s%> and he had <S%H7965>peace<s%> on all <S%H5650>sides<s%> around <S%H5439>him.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> under his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under his fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H723>stalls<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%> for his <S%H4817>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

Those <S%H5324>officers<s%> provided <S%H3557>food<s%> for <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and for all who <S%H7131>came<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H7979>table,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H2320>month;<s%> they let <S%H1697>nothing<s%> be <S%H5737>lacking.<s%>

<S%H8184>Barley<s%> also and <S%H8401>straw<s%> for the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and swift <S%H7409>steeds<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> they to the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the officers <S%H376>were,<s%> every man according to his <S%H4941>duty.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> and very <S%H7341>great<s%> <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> even as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is on <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H3220>seashore.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7235>excelled<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east,<s%> and all the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For he was <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than all <S%H120>men;<s%> than <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite,<s%> and <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and <S%H3633>Calcol,<s%> and <S%H1862>Darda,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4235>Mahol:<s%> and his <S%H8034>fame<s%> was in all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>
He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs;<s%> and his <S%H7892>songs<s%> were one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five.<s%>

He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> of <S%H6086>trees,<s%> from the <S%H730>cedar<s%> that is in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even to the <S%H231>hyssop<s%> that springs <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall;<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> also of <S%H929>animals,<s%> and of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> and of creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> and of <S%H1709>fish.<s%>

There <S%H935>came<s%> of all <S%H5971>peoples<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> from all <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> who had <S%H8085>heard<s%> of his <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
